title: Intransigent Warhammer
content:

The elegant design of this hammer belies its brutal, crushing power. This weapon does not give ground.

Intransigent Warhammer Location & Where to Find

Location: Can be found inside a chest on a Duergar boat at Ebon Lake

Intransigent Warhammer Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 100 Gp. Weight: 2.7 Kg. ID: ??
